phrases: -stuff-
-ED-
more stuff
Ever since I was little I knew I was not good.
Why do they keep a wild child like him...
We would be better off without him around...
He is like a demon's child.
No... I am not a demon!
The path of the righteous shall not be revealed to the unfaithful.
I lower the Ladder of Jacob with the aid of the Lord's Hand.
Let us go!
You are kidding me...
Are these stray dogs?
They stink!
They are Ghouls.
Demons that possess dead bodies.
Ghouls?
We are lucky that we are in Japan, otherwise human-form Ghouls would have showed up, too.
Are you calling this lucky?!
Wha...
A bomb?
Do not worry.
It is just holy water.
Heh, I am getting a bit too old to protect the kids...
Stop calling me a kid!
Let us go home while we still can.
Do you mean that this is not over yet?
I told you...
They will be coming for you.
The sun is setting soon.
That is when the demons get active.
You really do not remember anything?
Yeah...
Not even that you wanted to kill Okumura?
And that his body caught fire?
No... I do not remember anything.
I lent you 500 yen for dinner, Shiratori!
I paid the doctor's fee for you!
I bought you that Magical Poemy body pillow that you wanted so much!
I see... you did so much for me...
Or wait, you are just screwing with me!
I really paid the doctor's fee!
Huh?
Why?
We told you, you started a fight with Rin Okumura.
Okumura?
You wanted to give him a lesson but he beat you up instead.
So bad that we had to take you to the hospital!
Now that you remind me, my body hurts all over...
Are you okay, Shiratori?
Did he hit you too hard?
Right...
Okumura, that bastard...
He screwed me up, Okumura...
Okumura!
Who the hell you think you are, Okumura?!
Okumura!
Screw you!
Shiratori...
I am not going to stick around...
This is bad!
Hey, wait for me!
I am accustomed to this body, after all...
Where are you, our Young Master?
How are the preparations?
We got rid of all the Coal Tar.
We have drawn threefold barriers around the monastery.
Double it.
We cannot hold out until morning.
We are being chased by Astaroth's minions.
Pour triple-C strong holy water into the sewers!
Do not let a single one get in.
Understood!
Follow me.
This is the Demon-Slaying Blade, called Kurikara.
It is a legendary sword passed down since ancient times.
Your demonic powers are in this sword, sealed by its scabbard.
My powers?
This sword is more important than your own life.
Never ever hand it over to anyone else.
Do not let go of it even while sleeping.
Also, you must never draw it.
If you draw it, your demonic powers will awaken and you will never be human again.
Wait...
If I am a demon, what about Yukio?
Is he...?
You are fraternal twins.
In the womb Yukio's body was too weak so the power rejected him.
You are the only one who inherited the demonic powers.
Everyone knew about this?
That I am not human?
That I am the offspring of a demon?!
So this is the place where our Young Master is held in his temporary form.
Idiot!
What do you think you are doing!
Hey...
That hurt, you fucker!
I am coming for you, Young Master.
Why did you keep such an important thing a secret all this time?!
I could raise you only if you were human.
You were allowed to live on that condition, despite the demonic blood running through your veins.
Condition?
I raised you as human and that is why we told you nothing.
Nothing about the secrets of your birth.
Come!
I have come for you, Young Master.
Let us head back to Gehenna together.
The demons' attacks will weaken when dawn comes.
Get out of here and hide somewhere where the demons cannot find you!
Hide?
Where?
Take my phone.
There is only one number in there.
It belongs to my best friend.
Call him as soon as you leave the monastery.
I am sure he will protect you...
Hey, wai -
We are not done talking yet!
The path of the righteous shall not be revealed to the unfaithful.
The mist of uncertainty shall conceal the Gates of Heaven.
Protect Rin!
God dwells in my fist!
Demons dwell in my heart!
Heed my call, Guardian of Fertility, Moorkin!
Damn Exorcists...
Let me out, damn geezer!
Let me out!
I am... a demon...
Damnit...
Why do they keep a wild child like him...
He is like a demon's child.
I am not a demon!
I am really...
Brother...
What are you aiming at?
Moorkin!
He is fast!
Kyodo!
The Lord gives and the Lord takes away.
He shall bestow you life and happiness!
Praised be the name of the Lord!
Rot away, you piece of shit!
A human getting cocky?!
Maruta!
You will not get away!
He is huge...
I will tear every single one of you apart!
I said we are not done talking yet, you damn geezer!
Young Master...
What are you do...
O Lord, bind a millstone around its neck so that it shall never again rise from the depths of the Leviathan!
St-Stop...!
Chain it in darkness eternal, where it will not hear nor see!
Nagatomo, get the car ready!
Yes sir.
Izumi and Kyodo, put the Seal of Tetramorph on this boy.
And do not forget to perform the purification ritual.
Yes, sir.
Wait, we should treat their wounds first!
Our first and foremost priority now is to hide you.
Realize that you are the target of the demons!
I see... so if I leave it will be all over?
Rin!
Then I will leave!
That should make you feel better!
Rin!
Let go of me!
You would throw me away anyway!
I have been a problem child all my life...
We are not even really related!
Just strangers...
Rin!
Just be honest!
That you got tired of pretending we are family!
Or cannot a clergyman talk like that?
Maybe you want to play a good father to the end?
Do not screw with me!
You are not my father or anything!
Do not ever call yourself my father again!
It is almost daybreak.
Hurry and pack up!
Fine...!
Oh no...
Reverend Fujimoto!
Do not come closer!
Get... away... from me!
What is going on?!
At last I have got this body!
Finally I can meet you, my son!
Or whatever!
What is wrong with you, Old Man?!
He is possessed!
Satan has taken over his body!
What?!
Exactly.
I am Satan.
The God of Gehenna and your real father.
You can call me Daddy if you want.
Reverend Fujimoto!
Shut the hell up!
Guys!
Do not ruin this touching meeting!
I do not have time for that!
I am too strong for Assiah,
so you cannot bear my presence for long.
Not even this man's body.
Nor your mother.
What is this?!
This is the Gehenna Gate.
The magic gate connecting Assiah and Gehenna.
Let us go back to Gehenna!
Do not come near me!
Stay away!
What is that?
Did you wet yourself?
Pathetic...
Take back your demon powers already!
I am not a demon!
I am human!
This... I... I am a...
You have the blood of the God of Gehenna,
yet your body is of Assiah.
You are special.
That was a nice scream!
Today you will be reborn as a demon!
Someone!
Help me!
Happy birthday, my son!
That is... not...
He is my son!
And you will give him back!
You filthy Exorcist...!
Taking your own life, what a worldly priest you are!
But it is too late.
The Gehenna Gate will not let go of anything!
Old Man!
Get a hold of yourself!
Damnit!
Hey, Daddy...
What?
Why am I so different from everyone?
Am I really a demon's child?
No, you are not.
You are a human child.
The Demon-Slaying Blade...
Stop, Rin!
Did you forget what Reverend Fujimoto told you?!
If you draw that, you will...
Old Man...
If it is that embarrassing, show me how much you have grown!
I have not shown you anything yet!
Do not die on me, Old Man!
Daddy...
Brother?
Did you find a job?
Man, you are only growing up physically...
There is only one number in there.
It belongs to my best friend.
Call him as soon as you leave the monastery.
I am sure he will protect you...
Nice to meet you.
I represent the Japanese branch of True Cross Knight Order.
My name is Mephisto Pheles.
I was Reverend Fujimoto's friend.
Please accept my condolences.
Are you Exorcists too?
Indeed.
And we know everything about you.
It seems Reverend Fujimoto tried to raise you as a human,
but contrary to his wishes, you awakened.
Son of Satan wandering around Assiah is a threat of extinction to humankind.
In the name of the Vatican, we are to dispose of you.
Were not you supposed to protect me?
I would prefer not to mix public and private matters.
You have two choices left.
Be killed by us,
or kill us and run away.
You could also kill yourself, so actually that makes three choices.
Now, which one would suit you best?
Make me one of you!
I do not care what you say or what you think.
I am not the son of Satan.
My father is Shiro Fujimoto and no one else!
I see.
So you want to follow Reverend Fujimoto's dying wish?
But think about it.
What would you do if you became an Exorcist?
Kick Satan's ass!
What is so funny?
What?
Like Satan's son becoming an Exorcist?
This is great!
I have not had such a great laugh in a while!
I am serious!
Interesting!
Very well.
But... Sir Pheles!
Really?
This is a measure beyond the law.
However, Rin.
The path you have chosen is not a simple one.
One day you will have to face your fate and you will regret not dying here.
I do not care.
I am not a human or a demon anymore.
I have no choice but to go forward!
I will become an Exorcist!
From today, you will be studying here, too.
What the hell?!
No one told me about school!
Just die.
The Blue Exorcist
sei wo uke sorezore ga jinsei wo ouka
nou no black box wo shiru sore wa kou ka
you wa limit line wo subete ryouga
saa ikou ka fumidasu sore wa kyou da
yappa hibi wa ika sen kou sotsunaku konashitecha no no
stop nagare wo mikiwamena mazu mono to mo sezu ikou ze (here we go)
todokanu mono ya kagiri aru mono ni
atsuku naru mune wo osaetsukeru no wa
rikai mo sezu osaetsukeyou to shitekita
ano otonatachi to onaji jan ka yo
doushitatte kanawanai esoragoto darou ga
mune wo moyasu hi wa dare ni mo keseya shinai
sora kara furu kuroi ame ga kono mi nurashi furitomanakutomo
mada ore wa kawareru jibun de kaetemiseru

mada mada kieru na kokoro no hi wo
mada mada ikeru zo ikeru zo
After birth, people live as they wish
They then learn the black box in their head; is that bliss?
Just cross over, beyond the line of your limit
Let us go, take a step, and I mean this minute
Life's a bitch, so if it is easy, you are doing it wrong
Stop, which way is the world going?
Then ignore it and go wherever (here we go)
There are things I could never have, things with time
Is there a reason I force my heart upon them?
I never tried to understand, I just forced it on them
I am no better than those lifeless adults
Even if it is just a pipe dream I could never have
But no one can put out the fire in my heart
The black rain may pour hard and leave me drenched
But I know I can change, I will change myself
This is my pride, what makes up my core
I will not let my fire be put out; not yet
I will keep going, and I will never stop
Kimi to deatta no wa
Tada no guuzen ja nai
Kore wo unmei to yobunda
Sono hitomi ni utsuru
Bokutachi ga kagayaite
Irareru youni zutto
Mitsume tsuzukete
(Please be) Dakara moshi kono mune ga
(With me) Michi ni mayou hi ni wa
Mirai e no tobira wo hiraite hoshii
Michinaru sekai e to
Mai agarunda
Dakara sono te hanasanaide (buddy)
Yume ga mezasu basho e
Tsukanda kono kizuna
Nigiri shimete
Yume ga mezasu basho e
Te ni shita kono kizuna
Nigiri shimete
It was not by chance
that I met you.
This is what they call fate.
Reflected in your eyes is
the way we keep on shining together.
Let us keep our gazes locked
so it will not fade away.
(Please be) Maybe the day will come
(With me) that we will lose our way
while looking for the door to the future.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off
We will soar high
towards an unknown world.
So do not let go of my hand.
(Buddy)
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
while aiming for
the place of our dreams.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
while aiming for
the place of our dreams.
